program.name: Commodity Supplemental Food Program
program.description_short: Food support for people 60 years of age or older.
program.description: Food support for people 60 years of age or older. The Commodity Supplemental Food Program provides healthy food staples for individuals 60 years of age or older. You can get a monthly package of cereal, canned goods, and dairy products. You can pick up your package at a local food center.

documents.text: Proof of home address (ex: lease, mortgage statement, utility bill)
Proof of identity (ex: driver's license, official state ID card)
Proof of earned income  (ex: pay stubs, tax returns, W-2, 1099) & employer information
Proof of unearned income (ex: child support, social security, unemployment)
Proof of status in U.S. (ex: birth certificate, green card, work permit)
